text: Andrzej Baturo (16 May 1940 â€“ 9 June 2017) was a Polish artist photographer. He was the organizer of many important photo events, publisher, General director of the FotoArtFestival in Bielsko-Biala,founder and president of the Foundation Centre of Photography. He was born in Vilnius, Lithuania. Baturo died on 9 June 2017 in Warsaw, Poland at the age of 77. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Baturo's webpage Category:1940 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Polish photographers
title: Andrzej Baturo
